snippet: The French government announced the death of two French paratroopers in the Central African Republic, the country’s first casualties since its military force arrived to help stem increasing violence there.
lead_paragraph: The French government announced the death of two French paratroopers in the Central African Republic, the country’s first casualties since its military force arrived to help stem increasing violence there.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande arrives in the Central Africa Republic hours after the French government announced the death of two French paratroopers sent to help stem the increasing violence there.

headline.main: 2 French Paratroopers Killed in Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: Paratroopers From France Die in Unrest In Africa

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.
